sentences.en: ‘Have you finished your homework?’ ‘Not yet.’
sentences.cn: “你做完家庭作业了吗？”“还没有。”

sentences.en: ‘When’s your holiday?’ ‘Oh, not for ages yet.’
sentences.cn: “你什么时候去休假？”“噢，不知何年何月呢。”

sentences.en: "Have they been to visit you yet?" — "Just the once, yeah."
sentences.cn: “他们来看过你吗?”——“来过,就一次.”

sentences.en: Don’t go yet. I like talking to you.
sentences.cn: 别这就走啊，我喜欢跟你说话。

sentences.en: Has Edmund arrived yet?
sentences.cn: 埃德蒙到了吗？

sentences.en: He had asked around and learned that Billy was not yet here.
sentences.cn: 他四处询问，得知比利还没到这儿。

sentences.en: He has not yet been let in on the bad news.
sentences.cn: 他还不知道这个不幸的消息。

sentences.en: I haven’t asked him yet (= but I will ).
sentences.cn: 我还没有问他。

sentences.en: It could be months yet before they know their fate.
sentences.cn: 可能要好几个月他们才能知道自己的命运。

sentences.en: It is a part of Britain as yet largely unaccustomed to tourists.
sentences.cn: 英国的这一块地方还很不为游客所熟悉。

sentences.en: It was not yet clear how the rudder had sheared off.
sentences.cn: 还不清楚船舵是如何断裂的。

sentences.en: It was yet another case where the human eye outperformed radar.
sentences.cn: 这是肉眼胜过雷达的又一事例。

sentences.en: Like the best stories, this one may yet have a happy end.
sentences.cn: 就像最精彩的故事那样，这个故事也许仍会有个美好的结局。

sentences.en: Nothing is known as yet about what transpired at the meeting.
sentences.cn: 会上到底发生了什么现在还没人知道。

sentences.en: on an as yet undecided date
sentences.cn: 在还未确定的某个日期

sentences.en: She was caustically brilliant, yet totally loyal, unpretentious, human and tolerant.
sentences.cn: 她这个人才气逼人，可是绝对忠诚可靠，而且毫不做作，有人情味和宽容心。

sentences.en: The more recent conifer plantations cannot yet compare with the old woodlands.
sentences.cn: 年代较近的针叶树林场还比不上年代久远的林场。

sentences.en: The worst of the storm is yet to come.
sentences.cn: 最猛烈的暴风雨就要来了。

sentences.en: They feared that totalitarians might yet conquer the entire world.
sentences.cn: 他们担心极权主义者会征服整个世界。

sentences.en: They now have yet another drug problem on their hands.
sentences.cn: 他们现在又有个吸毒问题需要解决。

sentences.en: We are not yet fully resourced in Northern Ireland.
sentences.cn: 我们在北爱尔兰目前资源不足。

sentences.en: We’ve had no luck as yet.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，我们还没什么运气。

sentences.en: Yet now he was here, in extremis, to seek an alliance.
sentences.cn: 然而现在他就在这里，在绝境中寻求联盟。

sentences.en: You can’t give up yet!
sentences.cn: 你还不能放弃！

words.tran_cn: 仍然,不管怎样,无论如何,但是,另一方面

trans.tran_en: used to emphasize how much time will pass before something happens, or how long a situation will continue
used to introduce a fact, situation, or quality that is surprising after what you have just said
